Bash(cite you" vs "high risk of being invisible in AI-generated answers"\)
- NEW: FAQ section — 7 accordion questions covering:
  How is this different from SEO? / What does the snippet do? /
  Do I need to change my backend? / What is WebMCP? / What is llms.txt? /
  Which AI systems benefit? / Is the scan really free?

DASHBOARD — Snippet page
- "What happens automatically" — each item now has a full explanation of WHY
  it matters, not just what happens \(e.g. WebMCP explanation includes the
  W3C standard context and what "callable tools" means\)
- NEW: "What gets generated for your domain" section — lists all 5 output URLs
  \(llms.txt, ai-plugin.json, JSON registry, score, badge\) with a one-liner
  explaining what each one is and who uses it

DASHBOARD — AI Score page
- Dimension descriptions expanded from 5 words to 1–2 sentences each,
  explaining the consequence of a low score in plain language
- NEW: Score scale legend — compact 5-tier grid showing grade, range, and
  one-line interpretation, always visible above the breakdown

DASHBOARD — Overview empty state
- Added 3 preview cards showing what you get: Score, Capabilities, Improvement plan
- Expanded description mentions the 4-pass AI pipeline and that it''s free

DASHBOARD — Analytics empty state
- Expanded empty state explains what "AI traffic" means
- NEW: 4-card preview of what you''ll see once the snippet is installed
  \(GPTBot, ClaudeBot, PerplexityBot, pages AI reads\)

DASHBOARD — Registries page
- Empty selection state now explains what a "registry" is
- WebMCP status card now includes a one-line explanation of what WebMCP is
  and that it requires the snippet

\)")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$file = ''C:\\Users\\yanko\\OneDrive\\שולחן העבודה\\galuli\\dashboard\\src\\App.jsx''
$content = Get-Content $file -Raw -Encoding UTF8

# fontSize: 11 → 13
$content = $content -replace ''fontSize: 11\\b'', ''fontSize: 13''

# fontSize: 12 → 14  
$content = $content -replace ''fontSize: 12\\b'', ''fontSize: 14''

# fontSize: 13 → 15 \(but NOT fontSize: 130, 135 etc\)
$content = $content -replace ''fontSize: 13\([^0-9]\)'', ''fontSize: 15$1''

# font-size: 13px → font-size: 15px
$content = $content -replace ''font-size: 13px'', ''font-size: 15px''

# fontSize: 14 → 15 \(but NOT fontSize: 140+ etc\)
$content = $content -replace ''fontSize: 14\([^0-9]\)'', ''fontSize: 15$1''

Set-Content $file -Value $content -Encoding UTF8 -NoNewline
Write-Host ''Done''
")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "
$file = ''C:\\Users\\yanko\\OneDrive\\שולחן העבודה\\galuli\\dashboard\\src\\App.jsx''
$content = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllText\($file, [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8\)

# Process largest numeric values first to avoid cascade issues

# Step 10: marginBottom: 48 -> 28
$content = $content -replace ''marginBottom: 48'', ''marginBottom: 28''

# Step 9: marginBottom: 32 -> 20
$content = $content -replace ''marginBottom: 32'', ''marginBottom: 20''

# Step 8: marginBottom: 24 -> 16
$content = $content -replace ''marginBottom: 24'', ''marginBottom: 16''

# Step 13: gap: 48 -> 28 \(JSX style objects\)
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 48,'', ''gap: 28,''
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 48 }'', ''gap: 28 }''

# Step 12: gap: 32 -> 20
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 32,'', ''gap: 20,''
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 32 }'', ''gap: 20 }''

# Step 11: gap: 24 -> 16 \(ONLY JSX style objects\)
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 24,'', ''gap: 16,''
$content = $content -replace ''gap: 24 }'', ''gap: 16 }''

# Step 7: padding: 48 -> 32
$content = $content -replace ''padding: 48'', ''padding: 32''

# Step 6: padding: 64 -> 40
$content = $content -replace ''padding: 64'', ''padding: 40''

# Step 5: padding: ''48px 32px'' -> ''32px 24px''
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\(""padding: ''48px 32px''""\), ""padding: ''32px 24px''""

# Step 1: padding: ''40px 52px'' -> ''28px 36px''
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\(""padding: ''40px 52px''""\), ""padding: ''28px 36px''""

# Step 2: padding: ''36px 48px'' -> ''24px 32px''
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\(""padding: ''36px 48px''""\), ""padding: ''24px 32px''""

# Step 3: padding: ''32px 40px'' -> ''20px 28px''
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\(""padding: ''32px 40px''""\), ""padding: ''20px 28px''""

# Step 4: padding: ''24px 32px'' -> ''16px 22px'' \(after step 3, catches any remaining\)
$content = $content -replace [regex]::Escape\(""padding: ''24px 32px''""\), ""padding: ''16px 22px''""

[System.IO.File]::WriteAllText\($file, $content, [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8\)
Write-Host ''Done''
")
